T02D2544c:15a-1: a'arya manydzu shr'i n'a ma singg'a ti mandala bi dhi n'a ma /
T02D2544c:15a-3: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhes bya ba /
T02D2544c:15a-4: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal pas //
T02D2544c:15a-5: gzhon nur sku sprul me tog thod //
T02D2544c:15a-6: sku mdog gser can shes rab lha //
T02D2544c:15a-7: mi shes rgyun gcod ral gri 'dzin //
T02D2544c:15a-8: shes rab ye shes phyag 'tshal te //
T02D2544c:15a-9: 'jam dpal rang bzhin chos sku ni //
T02D2544c:15a-10: nam mkha' lta bur khyab pa la //
T02D2544c:15a-11: gdul bya'i dbang gis dkyil 'khor drug / bde gshegs rigs kyi dkyil 'khor bshad /
T02D2544c:15a-12: de la 'dir sems can gti mug can 'dul ba'i
T02D2544c:15a-13: gnyen por bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi
T02D2544c:15b-0: de yang gza' skar bzang po @15b la bsnyen pa'i khang pa bkra shis par 'jug par bya ste /
T02D2544c:15b-1: dpal ldan 'byor pa phun sum tshogs par byas la /
T02D2544c:15b-2: sgrub pa'i gnas de yang byi dor legs par byas
T02D2544c:15b-3: te spos bzang po yang phyogs bzhi rab btul nas
T02D2544c:15b-4: mandal la tshul dang mthun pa'i me tog bkod de
T02D2544c:15b-5: mchod pa bkram nas bde bar gshegs pa'i sku gzugs
T02D2544c:15b-6: rnams kyang bkram la ston 'bol ba'i steng du sems
T02D2544c:15b-7: can la phan pa'i blos 'dug ste /
T02D2544c:15b-8: ma rungs pa 'dul ba'i rgyal po gshin rje bshed po ni skad cig gis rdzogs par byas la /
T02D2544c:15b-9: khro bo'i rgyal po gdong drug pa phyag bcu gnyis pa /
T02D2544c:15b-15: lcags kyu rnams g-yas pa'i phyag na thogs pa'o //
T02D2544c:15b-21: dbyug to rnams g-yon du thogs pa'o //
T02D2544c:15b-22: spyan dmar ba bco brgyad sdang mig bgrad pa /
T02D2544c:15b-23: ljags drug glog ltar 'gyur ba'i zhal nas h'um h'um sgrogs pa /
T02D2544c:15b-24: zhabs drug gis 'gro ba rigs drug brdzis pa /
T02D2544c:15b-25: char sprin gyi mdog lta bur bsams la bgegs thams
T02D2544c:15b-26: cad bskrad la ji ltar 'dod pa'i srung ba'i 'khor
T02D2544c:15b-27: lo bya'o // de nas bsod nams dang ye shes
T02D2544c:15b-28: kyi tshogs par byas la bdag nyid rnam par snang
T02D2544c:15b-29: mdzad du gyur pa ni dang po'i sbyor ba'o //
T02D2544c:15b-30: gzhi'i sangs rgyas aa las rnam snang dkar po byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya /
T02D2544c:15b-31: de'i thugs kar dang po'i sangs rgyas /
T02D2544c:15b-32: de'i thugs kar shes rab 'khor lo rtsibs bcu gnyis pa aas mtshan pa /
T02D2544c:15b-33: de'i steng du aa las bcom ldan 'das shes rab
T02D2544c:15b-34: ye shes dkar po g-yon 'khor lo g-yas ral gri
T02D2544c:15b-35: thugs kar aa las zla ba'i steng na aa /
T02D2544c:15b-36: sangs rgyas de'i thugs ka nas dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor
T02D2544c:15b-37: lo'i lha rnams spro bar bzhed pas sngags 'di brjid
T02D2544c:15b-38: par bya'o // aom aa a'a sarba ta th'a ga ta hri da ya /
T02D2544c:15b-40: aom h'um hr'i: bha ga w'an dzny'a na m'urtti /
T02D2544c:15b-41: w'a g'i shva ra ma h'a p'a tsa sarba dharm'a
T02D2544c:15b-42: ga na aa ma la su pa ri shuddha dharma
T02D2544c:15b-43: dh'a tu dzny'a na garbha a'a: zhes brjod pas /
T02D2544c:15b-44: de 'phros shing 'dus pa las lha rnams kyi gnas su yi ge aa sha stag tu gyur ro //
T02D2544c:15b-45: aa de las rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams bskyed pa ni dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog go //
T02D2544c:16a-1: cing bstod de sprul pa'i sku dpag tu med pas
T02D2544c:16a-2: gti mug gi gnas sbyong ba'i phrin las mdzad pa
T02D2544c:16a-4: de lta bu'i bsnyen pa byas nas dkyil 'khor brtsam ste /
T02D2544c:16a-5: legs par bris nas lha dgod pa ni dbus su rnam par snang mdzad zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa /
T02D2544c:16a-6: shar du sems ma rdo rje /
T02D2544c:16a-7: lho ru rin chen sems ma /
T02D2544c:16a-9: byang du las kyi sems ma'o //
T02D2544c:16a-10: gru chad bzhi la sgeg mo la sogs pa bzhi'o //
T02D2544c:16a-11: khyams kyi gru bzhir ni bdug pa ma la sogs pa bzhi'o //
T02D2544c:16a-12: de nyid du bskal ba bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' yang tshul dang mthun par dgod do //
T02D2544c:16a-13: sgo bzhir ni sgo ma bzhi gzhag go //
T02D2544c:16a-14: de lta bu'i dkyil 'khor mdzes pa bris te /
T02D2544c:16a-15: sems can skal pa can dag kyang der gzhug par
T02D2544c:16a-16: byas la dbang bskur ba thob pa dang slob dpon
T02D2544c:16a-17: dang dkyil 'khor gyi lha la yang ci 'byor pa'i
T02D2544c:16a-18: yon pul [*phul] la slob dpon gyis kyang dbugs dbyung
T02D2544c:16a-19: ba dang / gzengs bstod de lung bstan par bya'o //
T02D2544c:16a-20: bde gshegs rigs mchog dam pa ni //
T02D2544c:16a-21: gti mug rnam par snang mdzad dpal //
T02D2544c:16a-22: dkyil 'khor cho ga gsungs pa yis //
T02D2544c:16a-23: dge bas rdzogs pa'i byang chub shog / slob dpon 'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa /
